dct_title_s: De Gelegentheyt van 't paradys ende 't landt Canaan, mitsgaders de eerst bewoonde landen
dct_description_sm: door Nicolaes Visscher ; C. Broeck, sculpsit.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Duytsche m√ølen" and "Uren gaens".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Includes illustrations of a ship, sea monster, compass rose, and a boy with fishing gear.
Appears in Korte beschrijvinge van de landschappen des werelts ; map 2.
